creator: skmetz@mindspring.com
text:
Created attachment 14447
Scp task containing preservelastmodified

creator: skmetz@mindspring.com
text:
The underlying library allows preservation of the last modified timestamp of a
file during scp, but the ant task doesn't support use of this feature.

This code adds support so that timestamps can be preserved during the scp ant task.

The underlying library allows preservation of the last modified timestamp of a
file during scp, but the ant task doesn't support use of this feature.

This code adds support so that timestamps can be preserved during the scp ant task.
creator: skmetz@mindspring.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
modified version committed as subversion revision 677187.

It only works for downloading from a remote server (and doesn't work for
directories at all).  So if anybody wants to complete the patch (my JSch FU isn't sufficient for that), you are welcome.

Leaving the report open so others may complete it.
